item.title: About This Site
item.description:
This site takes seriously the thesis that software is eating the world, and seeks to reconcile current approaches in the data science profession with best practice in software development.

Loosely, I’ll be calling this approach Lean data science, so called because it will be biased against heavy tooling like hadoop, and will be biased towards the data scientist building lightweight, standalone data products.

What does this mean?

  • An emphasis on building systems with machine learning at their core, not doing the same static analysis with the standard ML libraries
  • An opiniated approach to technologies in general, and a much greater emphasis on databases as part of the data scientist’s area of expertise
  • A no holds barred assessment of the current state of the data science profession, which is as vague as it is hyped.
